name: Bunny Blast: Toy House
description:
Match cubes and create powerful combos to blast toy cubes! Solve puzzles and pass levels to collect stars and tons of prizes! Let's relax and join yourself in the big blast adventure in Bunny Blast: Toy House.

BLAST ALL THE CUBES!
-Play by clicking to smash 2 or more adjacent cubes of the same color.
-Bombs that generate magic by clicking to smash 5 or more cubes will help you pass the level easily.
-Use subtle clicks and powerful bombs to collect stars through levels to win rewards.

FEATURES
- Cute characters and dolls to keep you company in your blast adventure
- Addictive gaming experience that can share with friends
- Tons of levels, easy and fun to play but challenging to fully master
- A puzzle game that will relax your brain
- Play anytime without internet & WIFI
- Simple operation & excitement challenges
- Brand new game with amazing screen, quality graphic and vision effects

How to play:
- Swap and match more than 2 identical toy cube to crush
- Make special toy combos to help you crush various barriers
- Gather enough target items to win before you run out of moves
- Solve all kinds of puzzles in the journey

Liked the game?
